solidstack.template
Class JSPLikeTemplateParser.ModalWriter

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.template.JSPLikeTemplateParser.ModalWriter
Enclosing class:
JSPLikeTemplateParser
public abstract static class JSPLikeTemplateParser.ModalWriter
extends Object

A writer that writes in different modes. The implementation of this class need to react to mode changes.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Nested Class Summary
static class JSPLikeTemplateParser.ModalWriter.Mode
          The different modes that the JSPLikeTemplateParser.ModalWriter should be able to work in.
